analyzed: śrī laṅkeśvara viracitā śivastutiḥ

original: gale kalitakālima prakaṭitendu bhālasthale vināṭitajaṭotkaraṃ rucirapāṇipāthoruhe /
analyzed: gale kalita kālima prakaṭita indu bhāla sthale vināṭita jaṭā utkaram rucira pāṇi pāthoruhe

original: udañcitakapālakaṃ jaghanasīmni saṃdarśitadvipājinamanukṣaṇaṃ kimapi dhāma vandāmahe // LSiv_1 //
analyzed: udañcita kapālakam jaghana sīmni saṃdarśita dvipa ajinam anukṣaṇam kim api dhāma vandāmahe
vṛṣa upari parisphurat dhavala dhāma dhāma śriyā kubera giri gaurima prabhava garva nirvāsi tat

original: rucirapunarumākucopacitakuṅkumai rañjitaṃ gajājinavirājitaṃ vṛjinabhaṅgabījaṃ bhaje // LSiv_2 //
analyzed: rucira punar umā kuca upacita kuṅkumaiḥ rañjitam gaja ajina virājitam vṛjina bhaṅga bījam bhaje
uditvara vilocana traya visṛtvara jyotiṣā kalākara kalākara vyatikareṇa ca aharniśam
vikāsita jaṭā aṭavī viharaṇa utsava prollasat tara amara taraṅgiṇī tarala cūḍam īḍe mṛḍam

original: vihāya kamalālayāvilasitāni vidyunnaṭīviḍambanapaṭūni me viharaṇaṃ vidhattāṃ manaḥ /
analyzed: vihāya kamalālayā vilasitāni vidyut naṭī viḍambana paṭūni me viharaṇam vidhattām manaḥ
kapardini kumudvatī ramaṇa khaṇḍa cūḍāmaṇau kaṭī taṭa paṭībhavat karaṭi carmaṇi brahmaṇi
bhavat bhavana dehalī vikaṭā tuṇḍa daṇḍa āhati truṭat mukuṭa koṭibhiḥ maghavat ādibhiḥ bhūyate

original: vrajema bhavadantikaṃ prakṛtimetya paiśācikīṃ kimityamarasaṃpadaḥ pramathanātha nāthāma he // LSiv_5 //
analyzed: vrajema bhavat antikam prakṛtim etya paiśācikīm kim iti amara saṃpadaḥ pramathanātha he
tvad arcana parāyaṇa pramatha kanyakā luṇṭhita prasūna sa phala drumam kam api śailam āśāsmahe
alam taṭa vitardikā śayita siddha sīmantinī prakīrṇa sumanaḥ manaḥ rana meruṇā meruṇā

original: na jātu hara yātu me viṣayadurvilāsaṃ mano manobhavakathāstu me na ca manorathātithyabhūḥ /
analyzed: na jātu hara yātu me viṣaya durvilāsam manaḥ manobhava kathā astu me na ca manoratha ātithya bhūḥ

original: sphuratsurataraṅgiṇītaṭakuṭīrakoṭau vasannaye śiva devāniśaṃ tava bhavāni pūjāparaḥ // LSiv_7 //
analyzed: sphurat surataraṅgiṇī taṭa kuṭīra koṭau vasan naye śiva devāniśam tava bhavāni pūjā paraḥ
vibhūṣaṇa sura āpagā śuci tarāla vāla āvalī valat bahala sīkara prakara seka saṃvardhitā

original: maheśvarasuradrumasphuritasajjaṭāmañjarī namajjanaphalapradā mama nu hanta bhūyādiyam // LSiv_8 //
analyzed: maheśvara suradruma sphurita sat jaṭā mañjarī na majjana phala pradā mama nu hanta bhūyāt iyam
bahis viṣaya saṃgati pratinivartita akṣa āvaleḥ samādhi kalita ātmanaḥ paśupateḥ aśeṣa ātmanaḥ
śiraḥ surasarit taṭī kuṭila kalpa kalpadrumam niśākara kalām aham vaṭu vimṛṣyamāṇām bhaje
tvadīya sura vāhinī vimala vāri dhārā valat jaṭā gahana gāhinī matiḥ iyam mama ākrāmatu
upottama sarit taṭī viṭapita aṭavī prollasat tapasvi pariṣad tulām amala mallikā ābha prabho
iti śrī laṅkeśvara viracitā śivastutiḥ samāptā
